00009 EagleDbTableData* EagleDbTableData_New(EagleDbTable *table, int pageSize)
00010 {
00011     int i;
00012     EagleDbTableData *td;
00013     
00014     if(NULL == table) {
00015         return NULL;
00016     }
00017     
00018     td = (EagleDbTableData*) EagleMemory_Allocate("EagleDbTableData_New.1", sizeof(EagleDbTableData));
00019     if(NULL == td) {
00020         return NULL;
00021     }
00022     
00023     td->table = table;
00024     td->usedProviders = EagleDbTable_countColumns(table);
00025     if(td->usedProviders > 0) {
00026         td->providers = (EaglePageProvider**) EagleMemory_MultiAllocate("EagleDbTableData_New.2", sizeof(EaglePageProvider*), td->usedProviders);
00027         if(NULL == td->providers) {
00028             EagleMemory_Free(td);
00029             return NULL;
00030         }
00031     }
00032     else {
00033         td->providers = NULL;
00034     }
00035     
00036     for(i = 0; i < td->usedProviders; ++i) {
00037         EagleDbColumn *column = EagleLinkedList_get(table->columns, i);
00038         td->providers[i] = EaglePageProvider_CreateFromStream(column->type, pageSize, column->name);
00039     }
00040     
00041     return td;
00042 }
00043 
00044 void EagleDbTableData_Delete(EagleDbTableData *td)
00045 {
00046     int i;
00047     for(i = 0; i < td->usedProviders; ++i) {
00048         EaglePageProvider_Delete(td->providers[i]);
00049     }
00050     EagleMemory_Free(td->providers);
00051     EagleMemory_Free(td);
00052 }
00053 
00054 void EagleDbTableData_insert(EagleDbTableData *td, EagleDbTuple *tuple)
00055 {
00056     int i;
00057     for(i = 0; i < EagleLinkedList_length(td->table->columns); ++i) {
00058         switch(td->providers[i]->type) {
00059                 
00060             case EagleDataTypeUnknown:
00061                 EagleLogger_Log(EagleLoggerSeverityError, "Unknown type.");
00062                 return;
00063                 
00064             case EagleDataTypeInteger:
00065                 EaglePageProvider_add(td->providers[i], tuple->data[i]);
00066                 break;
00067                 
00068             case EagleDataTypeText:
00069                 EaglePageProvider_add(td->providers[i], strdup(tuple->data[i]));
00070                 break;
00071                 
00072         }
00073     }
00074 }
